1: <pb/><e>Xsaalm laj David. Naq yo chi elelik chiru laj Absalón, li ralal.</e>
2: <pb/><t>At Qaawa',</t> <t>k'ajo' xk'ihaleb' li xik' neke'ilok we,</t> <t>xiikileb' li neke'raj numtaak sa' inb'een.</t>
3: <t>Naab'aleb' neke'aatinak chiwix:</t> <t>“Ink'a' chik taakole'q xb'aan li Yos”, chankeb'.</t>
4: <t>Ab'anan laa'at, at Qaawa',</t> <t>inramleb'at, inloq'alat,</t> <t>laa'at li nakattaqsink re li wilob'aal.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Ninyaab'a xk'ab'a' li Qaawa',</t> <t>ut a'an nikinxsume chalen chaq toj sa' li xloq'laj tzuul.</t>
6: <t>Ninyoklaak, ninwark ut na'ajk wu,</t> <t>xb'aan naq li Qaawa' natenq'ank we.<f>[8]</f></t>
7: <t>Us ta sutsuuqin xb'aan k'iila o'q'ob' chi tenamit,</t> <t>ab'anan ink'a' tinxiwa ruheb'.</t>
8: <pb/><t>Xaqlin, at Qaawa'!</t> <t>Chinaakol, at inYos!</t> <t>Xatz'ajiheb' chawuq' chixjunileb' li xik' neke'ilok we,</t> <t>xajori li ruuch reheb' li ink'a' useb' xch'ool.</t>
9: <pb/><t>Rik'in li Qaawa' nachalk li kolb'a ib'.</t> <t>Chichalq taxaq laawosob'tesihom sa' xb'een laatenamit!</t>
